sentences.english: The developer claims that this game has been a top-seller on wireless and on retail platforms.
sentences.chinese: 开发商声称，这场比赛已顶级无线和卖方的零售平台。

sentences.english: Some futurists claim that human capital is a company’s greatest asset.
sentences.chinese: 一些未来学家声称公司的人力资本是其最大的资产。

sentences.english: And the industry says the data are used harmlessly.
sentences.chinese: 而行业人士声称数据是无害使用的。

sentences.english: The birth of rearward-firing missiles has changed the concept of aerial warfare, according to Wu.
sentences.chinese: 据吴声称，后射导弹的出现改变了空战的概念。

sentences.english: But Berti says he's not just teaching recipes.
sentences.chinese: 他声称自己远非仅仅教授食谱。

sentences.english: The HTC team, he brags, is very global.
sentences.chinese: 他声称，HTC的团队是全球化的。

sentences.english: No one, he claimed, had ever seen such fans before.
sentences.chinese: 还声称，从来没人见识过这样的扇子。

sentences.english: The state government claims they have reduced personal taxation.
sentences.chinese: 州政府声称已经减收了个人税。

sentences.english: The dam builders claim they have completed an adequate design and safety analysis.
sentences.chinese: 水坝工程师声称，他们做了充分的设计和安全性分析。

sentences.english: Ms Harman fully accepts the court’s judgment, " a spokesperson said.
sentences.chinese: “哈曼女士完全接受法庭的裁判”发言人声称。

sentences.english: Aigner herself claims to do as much as she can to follow these guidelines.
sentences.chinese: 艾格纳声称自己会尽可能遵守这些准则。

sentences.english: Jung stated that the start of the work was very identical to a possession.
sentences.chinese: 容格声称作品的出发点是拥有十分相同的目的。

sentences.english: The findings uphold Iraq's prewar insistence that it did not possess chemical or biological weapons.
sentences.chinese: 调查结果支持了伊拉克战前声称没有生化武器的声明。

sentences.english: Israel said yesterday that it is calling up thousands of reservists .
sentences.chinese: 以色列昨天声称已经召集了成千上万个后备军。

sentences.english: The bank says it keeps plenty of liquid reserves against the dread day.
sentences.chinese: 银行声称他保有大量流动储备以应对恐惧日的到来。

sentences.english: They argue the institute, which will occupy a former divinity school building, is a totem to the late Friedman who they call a dinosaur of economic thought.
sentences.chinese: 他们声称这个研究所是已故弗里德曼的图腾。

definition: to declare to be untrue/to deny
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
it is said/allegedly/according to reports/or so they say
to put about (a story, plan, threat etc)/to let it be known (esp. of threat or malicious story)/to threaten
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
according to a report/It is reported that...
to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
to give orders/to spread news or rumors/to leak certain information intentionally
clear (of liquid)/limpid/to clarify/to make sth clear/to be clear (about the facts)
to settle (of liquid)/to become clear (by precipitation of impurities)/precipitate (chemistry)/to put in order/to quell disturbances
